x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: This probe checks to make sure that oauth_entity is properly extended from sys_metadata table. There are cases for older service now clients where the table is not extended properly.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Mobile Login Diagnostic
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Raise a HI ticket to request service now support to extend the oauth_entity table from sys_metadata

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_9bc834341b7f341467b05356624bcb33
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>This probe checks to make sure that oauth_entity is properly extended from sys_metadata table.  There are cases for older service now clients where the table is not extended properly.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Mobile Login Diagnostic</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Raise a HI ticket to request service now support to extend the oauth_entity table from sys_metadata</remediation><script><![CDATA[//Checking System properties
var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
util.checkSystemProperty('x_nuvo_mobile.authenticate.multisso.enabled', 'true', 'error');
util.checkSystemProperty('glide.authentication.external.disable_local_login', 'true', 'information');
util.checkSystemProperty('glide.authenticate.multisso.enabled', 'true', 'error');
util.checkSystemProperty('glide.authenticate.sso.redirect.idp', '', 'warning');


var result = util.getTableParent('oauth_entity');
//var result = util.getTableParent('x_nuvo_wm_shelf');
if (result.startsWith('No Parent Table')){
	util.handleOutput('Hi Ticket Needed with ServiceNow. The table oauth_entity has a null value for extends table. oauth_entity should extend the following table application file Table (sys_metadata)','critical', 'Mobile');
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anthony.Santos@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-10 21:31:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>9bc834341b7f341467b05356624bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mobile Login Diagnostic</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_9bc834341b7f341467b05356624bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
